s0021.chinese: 御寇與完相愛，恐禍及己，完故奔齊。
s0021.literal: Yu Kou with Wan mutually loved, feared disaster reach self, Wan thus fled Qi.

s0022.chinese: 齊桓公欲使為卿，辭曰：「羈旅之臣幸得免負檐，君之惠也，不敢當高位。」
s0022.literal: Qi Huan Gong wished make him minister, declined said: 'Sojourning minister fortunate get avoid burden eave, lord favor, not dare receive high position.'

s0023.literal: Huan Gong made him work overseer.

s0024.chinese: 齊懿仲欲妻完，卜之，占曰：「是謂鳳皇于蜚，和鳴鏘鏘。
s0024.literal: Qi Yi Zhong wished marry Wan, divined it, omen said: 'This called phoenix fly, harmonious cry clang clang.

s0025.literal: Have Gui after, will nurture at Jiang.

s0026.literal: Five generations its prosper, equal to proper ministers.

s0027.literal: Eight generations after, none rival capital.'

s0029.chinese: 完之奔齊，齊桓公立十四年矣。
s0029.literal: Wan fled Qi, Qi Huan Gong established fourteen years.

s0030.literal: Wan died, posthumous name Jing Zhong.

s0031.literal: Zhong gave birth Zhi Meng Yi.

s0032.chinese: 敬仲之如齊，以陳字為田氏。
s0032.literal: Jing Zhong enter Qi, with Chen character became Tian clan.

s0033.chinese: 田稚孟夷生湣孟莊，田湣孟莊生文子須無。
s0033.literal: Tian Zhi Meng Yi gave birth Min Meng Zhuang, Tian Min Meng Zhuang gave birth Wen Zi Xu Wu.

s0034.literal: Tian Wen Zi served Qi Zhuang Gong.

s0035.chinese: 晉之大夫欒逞作亂於晉，來奔齊，齊莊公厚客之。
s0035.literal: Jin grand master Luan Ying made chaos at Jin, came fled Qi, Qi Zhuang Gong thick guest him.

s0036.chinese: 晏嬰與田文子諫，莊公弗聽。
s0036.literal: Yan Ying with Tian Wen Zi advised, Zhuang Gong not listened.

s0037.literal: Wen Zi died, gave birth Huan Zi Wu Yu.

s0038.chinese: 田桓子無宇有力，事齊莊公，甚有寵。
s0038.literal: Tian Huan Zi Wu Yu had strength, served Qi Zhuang Gong, very favored.

s0039.chinese: 無宇卒，生武子開與釐子乞。
s0039.literal: Wu Yu died, gave birth Wu Zi Kai with Xi Zi Qi.

s0040.chinese: 田釐子乞事齊景公為大夫，其收賦稅於民以小斗受之，其（粟）［稟］予民以大斗，行陰德於民，而景公弗禁。
s0040.literal: Tian Xi Zi Qi served Qi Jing Gong as grand master, his collected taxes from people with small dou received, his granted people with big dou, practiced hidden virtue on people, yet Jing Gong not forbade.
